channel.title: transparent on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in transparent on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-28
item.description: LG Display shows off a versatile lineup of transparent OLED screens at CES 2022 (3 minute read) LG Display has unveiled several new concepts that will be on display at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-08
item.description: Uber sells its self-driving unit to Aurora (2 minute read) Uber has sold its self-driving unit, Advanced Technologies Group (ATG), to competitor Aurora Innovation.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-09
item.description: Samsung Is Developing A Transparent Smartphone (2 minute read) Samsung submitted a patent for a transparent smartphone in January.
